name: Sasuke Uchiha (うちはサスケ)
summary: Result oriented, and problem solving powerful shinobi. Have 10+ years of work experience ranging from formulating ideas to killing gods. Passionate about creating positive changes in human lives by using my powers and collaboration.

technical.Nature Types: Lightning, Fire, Earth, Wind, Water, Yin

declaration: I solemnly declare that all the above information is correct to the best of my knowledge and belief.

experiences.title: Supporting Kage (支う影)
projects: Destroyed large meteor that makes it through the village's defences
Defeated Chino of Land of Hot Water with dōjutsu Ketsuryūgan
Saved village from Shin Uchiha and clones with Mangekyō Sharingan

experiences.title: Main contributor
projects: Teamed-up with Naruto and sealed Kaguya Ōtsutsuki (Progenitor of Chakra) alongside black zetsu
Stopped Infinite Tsukuyomi casted by Kaguya
Stopped Obito (as 10 tails jinchūriki) to cast Infinite Tsukuyomi
Teamed-up with reanimated Itachi to stop the reanimation jutsu by disabling it's caster Kabuto (enhanced with sage powers) in the 4th great ninja war

experiences.title: Consultant Team lead
projects: Multiple battle experiences to capture Killer B (8 tails jinchūriki)

experiences.title: Founder & CEO (Chief Execution Officer)
projects: Fought all 5 kage in Five Kage Summit held at Land of the Iron.
Killed Danzō (11 sharingan ninja) also known as The Darkness of the Shinobi

experiences.title: Founder & CEO (Chief Execution Officer)
projects: Responsible for killing Itachi a legendary shinobi with Mangekyō Sharingan
Able to break Itachi's Tsukuyomi casted by Mangekyō Sharingan using only normal Sharingan
Defeated Akatsuki member Deidara in one on one combat

experiences.title: Sound Four Shinobi
projects: Absorbed Konohagakure's legendary Sannin Orochimaru inside Living Corpse Reincarnation jutsu
Able to fully utilize Orochimaru's Cursed Seal of Heaven
Defeated the group of Otogakure forces without receiving a scratch and without killing any opponents

experiences.title: Genin (Team Kakashi)
projects: Helped defeat Zabuza one of the Legendary Seven Ninja Swordsmen of the Mist
Reached final round of chunin exam as a first year genin

achievements: Defeated Akatsuki member Deidara in one on one combat
Trained by one of Konohagakure's legendary Sannin Orochimaru
Survived against ice-style kekkei genkai user Haku at age 12
Top of the class at Academy
